STICKYNOTES.Title: Sticky Notes
STICKYNOTES.EditStickyNoteControls: Edit or Convert to Sticky Note
STICKYNOTES.EnableDrawingToolsHint: If this is enabled, the layer controls switch to drawing tools when a new sticky note is created.
STICKYNOTES.NoteSizeSettingHint: This sets the size of the sticky notes (base size: 512Â px). This setting only applies to newly created notes.
STICKYNOTES.ScaleFontSizeSettingHint: This setting scales the font size relative to the size of the sticky note. If this is disabled, all sticky notes have a font size of 48 pt. This setting only applies to newly created notes.
STICKYNOTES.ScaleNoteSizeSettingHint: This setting scales the base size of sticky notes relative to the size of the canvas. This can be combined with the notes size and font size settings. This setting only applies to newly created notes.
